Falters at times: The claim falters at times because it incorrectly states that the band depicted police officers being shot, when in fact they were depicted being held at gunpoint.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support because it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that police officers were being shot.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the performance was intended to depict police officers being shot, when in reality it was a parody of a movie scene.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the performance, which is that it was based on a scene from the movie "John Q" and not meant to depict actual violence against police officers.
